kuusisto.tinysound
Class Music

java.lang.Object
  kuusisto.tinysound.Music

public class Music
extends Object

The Music class is an abstraction for music. Music objects should only be loaded via the TinySound loadMusic() functions. Music can be played, paused, resumed, stopped and looped from specified positions.

Author:
Finn Kuusisto
